info.name: Fuses
info.description: Shows the time from somebody's timezone

changelog.title: Oh god a bunch of new features
items: You can select "Presets" from very known abbreviations, such as UTC or CET. No need to google it up!
Are you american and wanna be different from everyone? Now you can use 12h clocks! (why you guys are so evil)
Now you can check the time of somebody after a certain time. Click the timer in the user's popout to show the UI
Wanted some quick actions? Now you can right click the timer or right click a user and select "Timezone actions" for doing some quick actions
Bored of seeing the first on the top of the user list? Sure, now you can sort by A-Z, Z-A, By newest and By Oldest
Accidentally deleted somebody and dont wanna do that again? Sure, you can lock your action icons now

changelog.title: Very cool changes
items: Fuses is no longer dependant to moment-timezones! I've found a timezone list, and since Discord already has moment built in, I could remove moment-timezone. This makes the plugin WAY smaller than before
Finally separated the list and the user selector on the UserAdd (now named UserList) in the code

changelog.title: BZZZZZZZZZ
items: I DID IT! I'VE FIXED THE BUG! YES, THE BUG! NOW I DON'T NEED A TEXT FOCUS HANDLER! (i wont explain it, but i gave the tip c;)

changelog.title: Wah! More announcements
items: I am planning to change the name of the plugin to just "Timezones", since "Fuses" is kinda a weird name to use. DM me if you find that change better! If I eventually change it, I might gonna push a update renaming the name and asking for you to redownload it
I am also thinking to make a timezone database with AAGaming#9395. So that means you'll be able to automatically get somebody's timezone if they use the same plugin!

There is a port to Aliucord that ItzOnlyAnimal#0001 made. It is very primitive and it only has the basics. But you can try out right now here: https://github.com/ItzOnlyAnimal/AliuPlugins/blob/builds/Timezones.zip
